summary:
Adds stand-alone dragonsoul armour, shield, sword, bow and arrows.
All are creatable at skyforge, armour under \"dragon\" and weapons under \"draugr\", and all require the dragon smithing perk and access to skyforge, ie. completed the companions questline.
descriptionHtml:
You\'re the Dovahkiin, you go around plundering dungeons, slaying your undead ancestors, saving beautiful dragons from ravenous princesses and generally being a bad-ass. Why not do it in style with armour and weapons specially made to let the guards know that yes, you are the dragonborn, and yes, you intend to look good whilst being said dragon born. 

NOW WITH FEMALE TEXTURES! Tell me what you think, because I\'m not too sure about it. Also, soul gems or teeth on the front?

Cuirass comes with its own enchantment, mainly because I think the vanilla enchantments available to put on a cuirass are pretty boring.

Craftable at skyforge after the companions quests are complete, and with the dragon smithing perk.

Install by pasting in your data folder!
author: the_aydan
